info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.search

Interface QueryWriter

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface QueryWriter
    Writes a part of SQL statement for the search condition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void write(QueryStatement query, QueryWriterResolver resolver, FieldPath contextFieldPath, Object queryParameter)
      Writes the part of the SQL statement body

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(QueryStatement query,
           QueryWriterResolver resolver,
           FieldPath contextFieldPath,
           Object queryParameter)
    throws QueryBuildException
        Writes the part of the SQL statement body
        Parameters:
        query - query to which body to write the condition and where to add parameter setters
        resolver - the resolver to resolve nested conditions
        contextFieldPath - current document field path
        queryParameter - currently processing query parameter
        Throws:
        QueryBuildException - when something goes wrong
